name: Trendy Resale
bullet1: A fully responsive website for reselling products
bullet4: All product under a category is displayed within a page
bullet5: User must be logged in to make a payment
technology: Tailwind, Daisy UI, React.js, Firebase, MongoDB, Stripe, Vercel.

name: Code Tutor
bullet1: A fully responsive website that contains programming courses
bullet3: Course Data is loaded from a custom API
bullet4: A blog page is introduced with interesting articles
bullet5: User must be logged in to get premium access for courses
technology: Bootstrap, React Bootstrap, React.js, Rest API, Firebase.
